title: 2BR UNIT CLOSE TO SULLIVAN STATION! WITH W&D IN UNIT! GREAT DEAL!
posting_body: Looking for a new place in the heart of Boston with amenities designed with you in mind?
We’ve found the perfect spot for you.
Steps away from either Sullivan Square or Community College stations, with a Whole Foods at your fingertips, and the shops at Assembly Row, we’re confident you’ll make yourself at home.
Kick back and relax in the outdoor courtyard, enjoy the fitness center, and park your car or bike either in the underground parking or bike rooms.
This unit features walk in closets, stainless steel appliances, and a washer/dryer in unit!
Interior dog wash and exterior dog run areas (additional fee may apply)
-Coat closets and movable islands (select units only)
We are looking forward to hearing from you soon and showing you this incredible unit.
Do you absolutely love this listing, but are a bit curious to see others?
We’ve got units in Boston, from studios to 6 bedrooms, ready to show you!
For quickest response, send an email to contact (at) <URL> to set up your next showing with Justin of Hartley Realty Group today!
*Pricing, brokerage coverage, and availability subject to change without notice based on availability, lease term, and move-in date selected.
Pictures may be of similar unit, could cause minor changes to finishes unit to unit.
The apartment advertised may no longer be available for rent.
